name: 64² Pixels Of Battle
description:
A local 1-keyboard/2-player strategy game made for #LOWREZJAM 2016.

Each player chooses a character and configure her attack, defense and special action attribute points.

During the battle, players have 3 seconds to decide which one of the three actions they will choose. This is not a turn-based game so both players' choice are made at the same time!

Who will win the battle?

PS: The game zip file contains all the instructions and rules to understand the game.

PPS: Original resolution is 64x64 pixels but game resolution is upscaled 800% (512x512 pixels).
